QuestData.Title: All We Can Spare
QuestData.Description: Alright, I called in every favor I could. Here's what we got.$B$BCho must be on to something big!$B$BLemme know when you're ready to go see him - I got a ride all prepared for ya.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Scavenged Jade to Lorewalker Cho at Emperor's Omen. Speak with Toya in Dawn's Blossom for a ride.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ah, hello again, $p! You received my message, then?
QuestData.RewardText: I knew Toya would come through for me!$B$BHe can get anything, you know.
